sub_topic: Probability of a certain stock price change
message_1: Suppose the probability of a certain stock price increasing is 0.60, what is the probability of that same stock price decreasing?
message_2:
The total probability of all possible outcomes (in this case, the stock price increasing or decreasing) must equal 1. If the probability of the stock price increasing is 0.60, then the probability of the stock price decreasing can be found by subtracting the probability of the stock price increasing from 1:

Probability of stock price decreasing = 1 - Probability of stock price increasing
Probability of stock price decreasing = 1 - 0.60
Probability of stock price decreasing = 0.40

So, the probability of the stock price decreasing is 0.40 or 40%.
